API Documentation¶

podgen.Podcast(**kwargs)

Class representing one podcast feed.

podgen.Episode(**kwargs)

Class representing an episode in a podcast.

podgen.Person([name, email])

Data-oriented class representing a single person or entity.

podgen.Media(url[, size, type, duration, …])

Data-oriented class representing a pointer to a media file.

podgen.Category(category[, subcategory])

Immutable class representing an iTunes category.

podgen.util
